Community Participation

Community participation services aim to enhance social inclusion and engagement in community activities, events, and recreational pursuits.

How you can help

  • Identify and facilitate participation in local community events.
  • Develop social skills and foster connections within the community.
  • Encourage involvement in recreational and leisure activities.
  • Tailor support to individual preferences and interests.
